[PYG-371] âž¡Query Executor Support Listing Edges with Properties (#472)

# Description

Support for list/aggregate/search views.

## Bump

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## Changelog
### Added

- [alpha feature] The `QueryExecutor` now supports to
list/aggregate/search views for edge properties.
- [alpha feature] The `QueryExecutor` now supports to
list/aggregate/search views for node and edge properties.
